sn4.23:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn4.23:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā godhiko isigilipasse viharati kāḷasilāyaṃ.
sn4.23:4.4: Atha kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṃ cetovimuttiṃ phusi.
sn4.23:4.5: Atha kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya cetovimuttiyā parihāyi.
sn4.23:4.6: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṃ cetovimuttiṃ phusi.
sn4.23:4.7: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya cetovimuttiyā parihāyi.
sn4.23:4.8: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṃ cetovimuttiṃ phusi.
sn4.23:4.9: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā … pe …
sn4.23:4.11: Catutthampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto … pe …
sn4.23:4.13: Catutthampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā … pe …
sn4.23:4.19: Chaṭṭhampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṃ cetovimuttiṃ phusi.
sn4.23:4.20: Chaṭṭhampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya cetovimuttiyā parihāyi.
sn4.23:4.21: Sattamampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṃ cetovimuttiṃ phusi.
sn4.23:5.4: Atha kho māro pāpimā āyasmato godhikassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4.23:9.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmatā godhikena satthaṃ āharitaṃ hoti.
sn4.23:9.2: Atha kho bhagavā “māro ayaṃ pāpimā” iti viditvā māraṃ pāpimantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn4.23:11.2: “āyāma, bhikkhave, yena isigilipassaṃ kāḷasilā tenupasaṅkamissāma yattha godhikena kulaputtena satthaṃ āharitan”ti.
sn4.23:11.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
sn4.23:12.1: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ yena isigilipassaṃ kāḷasilā tenupasaṅkami.
sn4.23:12.2: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ godhikaṃ dūratova mañcake vivattakkhandhaṃ semānaṃ.
sn4.23:12.3: Tena kho pana samayena dhūmāyitattaṃ timirāyitattaṃ gacchateva purimaṃ disaṃ, gacchati pacchimaṃ disaṃ, gacchati uttaraṃ disaṃ, gacchati dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ, gacchati uddhaṃ, gacchati adho, gacchati anudisaṃ.
sn4.23:13.2: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ dhūmāyitattaṃ timirāyitattaṃ gacchateva purimaṃ disaṃ, gacchati pacchimaṃ disaṃ, gacchati uttaraṃ disaṃ, gacchati dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ, gacchati uddhaṃ, gacchati adho, gacchati anudisan”ti?
sn4.23:13.4: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, māro pāpimā godhikassa kulaputtassa viññāṇaṃ samanvesati:
sn4.23:13.6: Appatiṭṭhitena ca, bhikkhave, viññāṇena godhiko kulaputto parinibbuto”ti.
sn4.23:13.7: Atha kho māro pāpimā beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4.23:15.1: “Yo dhīro dhitisampanno,
sn4.23:17.4: tatthevantaradhāyathāti.
